title: I'M JUST TIRED OF FIXING THIS PROBLEM....UN-BOXING SOME HANDY FARM GOODIES AND MORE!!

tasks.task: Check on goats and address hay access issues.
subtasks: Use pitchfork to clear hay-bound electric fence.
Plan goat mobile construction to prevent hay waste.

tasks.task: Remove front wheels and inner tubes from zero turn mower.
subtasks: Jack up mower, secure with jack stands.
Loosen and remove front tires and inner tubes.
Inspect wheel bearings and apply grease.
Attempt to replace inner tubes in tires, seek professional assistance for further repairs.

tasks.task: Unbox and install new gear on Gator.
subtasks: Install overalls, coplin mounts, double rhino clips, and heavy duty magnets.
Test new mounts and tools for functionality.
Assemble trailer structure for goat transport.
Design hay storage system to prevent wastage.
